items.name: HostCluster - WHMCS Hosting WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: WHMCS Hosting WordPress Theme

items.description:
HostCluster is a Hosting WordPress Theme and is one of our most valuable Server related business themes. We decided that HostCluster is going to represent your entire hosting business. It has more than 10 demos, and each one of them is focused on a particular part of your server hosting business. HostCluster can be tagged as a sophisticated platform that is capable of many actions that take place in the hosting area. If you need a theme to keep your business safe and do the hard job for you, HostCluster is the right tool you can apply to your business identity.

WHMCS Bridge Plugin

Stop thinking about the laborious process that stays behind the whole hosting or domain acquisition process. HostCluster comes equipped with the WHMCS plugin so that you can digitalize the entire core process of your business. We integrated the WHMCS Bridge plugin in this theme to provide a consistent and unique user experience to any customer that is coming to your website with a server, hosting purpose.

Some of the core features of this plugin will make things easier for you. WHMCS comes with a caching feature, with permalinks, SEO Titles, Custom Templates, Enhanced Visual Integration, Single Sign-On, Multi-lingual WHMCS support, Shortcodes and more. Because of the pro version of the WHMCS Bridge Pro plugin, your clients can add comments on your blog posts, share info with friends and order custom hosting plans. More than that, your customers can pay their bills using this plugin.

Main Homepage Sections

Straight from the top of the main home page, you can make available an essential feature that HostCluster can offer. The domain name checker has complex functionality. Your customers will be redirected to a “Register Domain” page when they click search. This page is straightforward to use, and your customers can add to the cart directly from this page. They can also see the price for the domain they searched for.

On the main homepage, you can display a block with Hosting Solutions so the customers can have a first preview of what services can you offer and for what prices. In this section we designed the services to be organized in packages, and your customers can only choose to read more information about them.

In the next section, you can add more information about your particular server hosting services. For example Data Migration, Firewall, Cloud Backup, DDoS Protection or Data Security. All of these can be changed to fulfill your willings.

Going deeper into the page, your customers can observe an interactive map that can instantly show some pop-ups full of information about your server locations.

We said before that HostCluster is a very complicated server hosting theme, and similar to GoDaddy or Namecheap, and you can now have a section to display some packages about any firewall service you provide. You can customize plans for any customer, and you can build pricing plans for any budget starting from simple or basic hosting packages or business plans for convincing customers.

It was compulsory to have a testimonial section because, in the hosting business environment, your brand can be easily recommended to other potential customers.

At the end of the main homepage, you can add a section where you can display your partners or previous clients or projects.

TLD Domains Sections

You will notice in the main menu a section called “DOMAINS”. We thought that for higher productivity, we need to add the domain checker in the main menu. However, we made a separate page for this one. Following the main functionality of the checker, on this page, you will see a section with Frequently Asked Questions. In this area of activity, we tried to make everything as simple as possible. With HostCluster, you have a live chat for support, but we wanted to add as much information as we can so that your clients can have the best user experience.

Hosting

As we said before, user experience is significant when it comes to a server hosting provider company. The “HOSTING” menu section will allow you to offer details about your services, but this time with a dedicated page for each other. For example, we added 4 Hosting services like: “Dedicated Servers”, “Shared Hosting”, “VPS Hosting”, “WordPress Hosting”. Your customers can interact with these sections and receive a meaty piece of information about each hosting service. You can display the pricing plans for every service, testimonials and more.

We wanted to give you even more. With HostCluster hosting WordPress theme, you can have your blog. You can always share your experience or valuable information with any customer. Besides that, this a straight forward and an excellent way to boost your traffic. With some SEO optimization, your articles can attract many customers.

Services

Now we are talking about the beautiful part about HostCluster and why we are so proud of this theme. We wanted something more than a WHMCS Based theme. We wanted to allow you to customize your business. You never know what ideas you might have and how well they can work. We did some research on GoDaddy and Namecheap, and we came with a great idea. We added a menu section with services. We chose to add, Online Marketing, Email Marketing, Cloud Services or Content Delivery Network. Of course, this page is customized. Even so, let`s take de Email Marketing for example. The most important thing about this feature is that you can explain the importance of an email marketing campaign to your customers. You can display pricing packages and provide a high-quality service.

IT competences shouldn’t go to waste. Did you have a stroke of genius and realized that hosting websites are the future? If yes, then ModelTheme has got your back! Our newest theme, HostCluster (WHMCS WordPress Theme) is ideal if you are looking to venture into hosting as an online business. HostCluster’s features include but are not limited to:

  • A WHMCS Bridge Plugin (offers caching, SEO Titles, visual integration, IP address resolution patch, shortcodes and many more – https://wordpress.org/plugins/whmcs-bridge/);
  • Possibility to purchase domains (.com, .net, .org and the rest – it’s easy, accesible and beautifully designed so that the customers don’t miss this component while browsing);
  • WP Page Builder – as simple as it is indispensable;

Our Theme Panel have over 100 options that you can choose from the demo variants are not as limited as others and we offer 5 versions that you can explore to your liking.

Of course, a hosting website cannot exist without Pricing Tables and we have already set up a couple for you, which you can later customize yourself.

We also offer a modern, attractively-designed live chat feature, A sleek, extensive megamenu that doesn’t clutter up the space of theme but that, when activated, can contain all the information you desire

Our Service Page Templates can be summarized in one word: diverse. You can see for yourself following the Live Demo.

Demos and Inner Pages List

  • Home
    • Main Home
    • Main Home No TLDS
    • Home VPN
    • Home WP Hosting
    • Home Crypto Hosting
    • Home Video
    • Home Slider
  • WHMCS
    • WHMCS-bridge
    • Announcements
    • Server Status
    • Submit Ticket
    • Support Tickets
  • Domains
  • Services

    • Online Marketing

Extended Features List:

  • Redux Framework Theme-Options Panel
    • General Settings
    • Unlimited Sidebars
    • Styling Settings
    • Header Settings
    • Footer Settings
    • Contact Settings
    • Blog Settings
    • 404 Page Settings
    • Social Media Settings
    • MailChimp Newsletter
    • Demo Data Importer
  • Multiple header variants
  • RTL Compatibility – added via ModelTheme RTL Compatiblity Plugin – View Details + Download the Free RTL Plugin
  • One-click importer
  • 600+ Google Fonts
  • Font Icons instead of images
  • Well documented
  • PHP-Ajax Contact Form
  • Various Custom Widgets and much more
  • Multiple Colors & Skins Throughout
  • Eye-catching CSS Animations
  • Compatible with: Contact form 7
  • Permanent updates
  • Excellent Typography
  • Optimized for high speed
  • Fast and easy to use

In the case you made a purchase by mistake or for features that don’t exist:

We do not provide refunds for these sorts of mistaken purchases. Due to the nature of digital goods, it’s not possible to “return” them. Therefore, refunds can only be given for products that are broken, but this is not the case, as our theme have been reviewed and accepted by an Envato review team.

items.description:
Art, Culture & Entertainment Magazine

Cultera – A beautiful, elegant and easy-to-use WordPress theme with a lovely and classy functional design. Cultera is an ideal choice for any culture or art magazine website. We have developed this theme with elegance in mind. Cultera comes with a native layout and includes support for an exclusive events plugin – Events Manager.

Easy-to-use back-end dashboard powers flexible, modular and responsive layout; theme includes lots of features like Drag & Drop page builder (Elementor plugin), support for WooCommerce and much more. You will receive a detailed documentation along with additional features like Unlimited color schemes, uncountable Google webfonts, custom widgets and much more. Functions are based on solid back-end Redux framework.

Main theme features:

  • Easy-to-use page builder (Elementor plugin),
  • Advanced theme admin panel,
  • Responsive layout,
  • Unlimited color schemes – using colorpickers,
  • Google font selector/custom typography,
  • 5 Posts formats: standard, video, audio, gallery, link,

items.name: Singara - Multipurpose Hosting with WHMCS WordPress Themes

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: SinGara is a Multipurpose Technology, Hosting Business with WHMCS WordPress Theme designed for All kinds of Technology, Domain and Hosting Business. Anyone can easily update/edit this Theme to follow our Well Sorted Documentation.

items.description:
Singara is a Multipurpose Hosting with WHMCS and Technology Business WordPress Theme designed for All kinds of Technology, VOIP, Cloud Service, Telecom, Domain and Hosting Business. Fully Compatible with WHMCS Bridge based on WHMCS v8.5.x. Also included a custom WHMCS template based on WHMCS v8.5.x to use separately. Singara is a theme for technology and software businesses as well as for VOIP and web hosting companies based on Visual Composer. The theme has all the required functionality for a hosting services company, including domain search and registration functionality with WHMCS. Fancy pricing tables let you display hosting prices for different server configurations and hosting packages. If you need to create a website for a hosting company, a technology blog or a software review blog, Hosting Business Technology WP Theme is a great choice.











Main Features of Singara:

  • Latest WordPress v6.0.x Ready
  • Latest WHMCS v8.5.x Ready
  • WHMCS Template Included for WHMCS v8.5.x
  • GDPR Compliant Ready
  • Custom meta box cmb2
  • Visual Composer Included
  • Full screen Image Background
  • Mail-chimp Ajax Integrated
  • Fully Compatible with Whmcs Bridge
  • Error free code
  • Strong focus on usability
  • True One-Click Demo Installation
  • Completely Styled Forms with included Contact-Form-7 Plugin
  • Advanced Theme Options Panel ( Redux framework! )
  • Blog page Layout Style ( Fullwidth, Left Sidebar, Right Sidebar)
  • Page Layout Style ( Fullwidth, Left Sidebar, Right Sidebar)
  • WooCommerce Ready
  • WooCommerce Layout Style ( Fullwidth, Left Sidebar, Right Sidebar)
  • Child Theme compatible (example child theme is already included)
  • 3 WordPress Custom Post Types ( Slider, Gallery, service )
  • Modern Cross Browser Compatibility: FireFox, Safari, Chrome, Edge, IE9, IE10, IE11
  • Ready for translation ( .pot files included )
  • Unlimited Color Version
  • Strong Page Meta Option Like (Enable Page Loader, Page Breadcrumb Disable, Page Menu Selector, Homepage section image/color selector, Page Layout Selector, Header Selector, Header Logo Uploader)
  • Unlimited Google Fonts
  • Clean Code
  • 100% Fully Responsive WordPress Theme
  • Modern Cross Browser Support
  • W3C Validated Code
  • Free Updates
  • Well Documented

items.name: Minimal WooCommerce Theme - Sophie

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Responsive WP WooCommerce Theme

items.description:
Minimal WooCommerce Theme – Sophie is a responsive multipurpose WooCommerce theme. This clean, modern and minimal design gives a particular emphasis on selling and eCommerce stores. It is perfect for clothing, fashion, accessories, bags, shoes, watches, sports, gadgets, and other.

Sophie WooCommerce theme is built based on KingComposer, using faster drag and drop page builder. Create a stunning website without touching a line of code with the help of powerful Theme Page Builder.

Though there are 4+ Home Styles and 30+ inner pages available but you can easily create different Home or other pages. This SEO-friendly and mobile-friendly theme is fully customizable and editable. For instance, you will get Theme Layout Options (Full Width, Boxed, Boxed Style 2, and Boxed Style 3), Unlimited Colors for Design & Content Elements, Header Customization, Footer Customization, Logo Customization, Menu Customization, Buttons Customization, and Other Options.

Show your products in gorgeous catalogs and engage your audience. You can display new products, deal of the day with Add to Cart button, our products, latest blog, newsletter subscription, free shipping option, Sophie discount codes and offers, social media icons, and payment methods.

items.name: Multicon - Multi-Purpose Construction Industry Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Multicon is a new multi-purpose Construction theme by CMSSuperheroes that covers all areas of the construction industry. This theme comes with 8 fully built demos with all the pages your business will need and we've included plugins to allow you to add your own pages or just edit our own. We've made it really quick and easy for you to change the theme colours and typography too so you can spend less time building and more time working!

items.description:
Multicon is a new multi-purpose Construction WordPress Theme by CMSSuperheroes that covers all areas of the construction industry. This theme comes with 8 fully built demos with all the pages your business will need and we’ve included plugins to allow you to add your own pages or just edit our own. We’ve made it really quick and easy for you to change the theme colours and typography too so you can spend less time building and more time working!

Every demo is fully responsive and looks great on all screen sizes so you’ll never miss a customer opportunity, and with our powerful contact forms it’s super quick and easy for your customers to get in touch.

We’re always here to support you after sale too, so any questions about features or after sales support then please get in touch and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.

Theme Features

  • Responsive – This theme is responsive to give a perfect user experience on all devices
  • Boxed or fullwidth layout – This can be set globally or even per page!
  • Built on Twitter Bootstrap – Pro Business uses Twitter Bootstrap. This means that a range of shortcodes are automatically supported. For ease of use you can use the Visual Composer, Easy Bootstrap Shortcode or any other plugin to easily add visuals to your website.
  • Slider Revolution plugin included – This theme includes the Slider Revolution plugin, saving you $19
  • (WPBakery) Visual Composer plugin included – This theme includes the Visual Composer plugin, saving you $30
  • Essential Grid plugin included – This theme includes the Essential Grid plugin, saving you $20
  • Contact Form 7 plugin support – This theme includes styling for the Contact Form 7 plugin!
  • Translation Ready – With added support for the WPML plugin
  • Built with Less .css
  • Parallax Image and Video Scrolling Sections
  • Shortcode Support
  • Demo content included!
  • Unlimited Color Options
  • Moveable & Unlimited Sidebars – Move the sidebar to the left, the right, or hide it entirely for a fullwidth page or post! (global or page/post specific)
  • Designed with HTML5 and CSS3
  • Customizable Design & Code
  • Unlimited Portfolio Layouts
  • Unlimited Blog Layouts
  • All installed Extensions are included
  • Cross Browser Support
  • Video Tutorials
  • Detailed Documentation Included
  • Full Support
  • + many more features
  • More features coming soon

Checkout Our Great Theme

Need support?

Head over to our dedicated support site https://cmssuperheroes.ticksy.com or https://cmssuperheroes.com/ticket

More than 50+ unique page templates, more than 30 ready-made elements that will help to collect new templates, 8 unique portfolio styles, 15 styles for the blog and magazine. All this will help you make a modern trend site and stand out from 100 other competitors.

Stylish, convenient and understandable pages will help you to quickly convey to your customers the necessary information. Beautiful galleries and portfolio will help to stand out from the crowd and show your projects in the best possible way. Design and page templates look equally stylish on different devices (tablets, laptops, smartphones and others) That will allow you to capture a large audience and show your work to everyone.

items.name: Unbound - Business Agency Multipurpose Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Unbound is feature packed WordPress theme with designs made for business agencies & creative agencies. While developing this theme, we made sure the theme is easy to use and highly customizable. The theme is built with 150+ original pre-designed template blocks which you can simply drag and drop to include in your design to create a completely new design of your own. Play with drag & drop template block builder option to make your own template. Unbound has potential of making thousands of combinations of design. It also has unlimited theme color option. Enjoy Unbound!

items.description:
Multipurpose Business Agency WordPress Theme. With 25+ Corporate Agency multipurpose designs in-built, you can build your dream business consulting agency site within an hour. Unbound is powered by 100+ template blocks which will help you drag & drop modules on any page and quickly finish your site without writing much code.

Unbound Business Agency – Multi-Purpose Corporate WordPress Theme

Unbound WordPress Theme is a fully loaded and power-packed ‘super tool’, that helps create a 100% dynamic design for your corporate, business or agency website. Make the first impression the last impression with Unbound, which is probably the best Agency and corporate WordPress theme. Make an impression and give your website that definitive. With more than 150+ original pre-designed template blocks, it becomes easy to customize look & feel of your/client’s site. Best part is, you don’t need to write any code to make these changes. Everything is drag & drop.

With Unbound, we simplify your web design & development experience with a multitude of shortcodes. Creating a fully responsive website design is a whole lot easier with our classic Unbound theme. Implementation of a clean code means that the loading time for your website would be quick.

This highly flexible and intuitive WordPress theme offers a user-friendly interface that enables in the design of a stunning website, even though you do not have a prior coding language. Whether you belong to any niche business segment, this WP theme is perfectly tailored to the needs of the growing industry. It is a professionally created, fully functional, interactive, engaging and intuitive Business Agency WordPress theme that can easily give a run for money to the best Corporate WordPress themes. Build a high-performance website with considerable ease through this classic WP business theme that has all the essential features, functionalities, aspects and elements to provide your online business that shot in the arm.

150+ Pre-Built Template Pages

This WordPress template or theme consists of the ever popular WPBakery Page Builder, which makes it real convenient to mix and match elements, that help design & develop your site from the scratch. With an excess of 150 ‘ready-to-use’ template blocks which can be directly imported onto your page, Unbound helps in developing stunning web site in a flash. The 100% customizable template blocks, can be customized even further and arranged in a multitude of ways. Not a single line of HTML code is required, when customizing the design and content of your website. This is the USP of Unbound WordPress.

More than 90 Element Shortcodes

With a multitude of shortcodes and configuration options that help ease your workflow, Unbound Business Agency WordPress Theme is engineered to simplify your web designing experience. Go on to add new items from any of the 90 elements provided, and see your changes happening in a real-time manner. Our dynamic pre-built shortcodes allow you to add variation in site appearance. Almost all shortcodes have multiple options to play with.

20 Pre-Built Demos

Unbound WP Theme features 20 pre-built demos which includes Home Pages, Landing Pages, Inner pages Pages, blog, shop that are required to launch a site quickly. While importing demos, you’ll get specific theme colored demo pages. Suppose you liked Pink color design, so while importing our dynamic import script would send let you import all inner pages in Pink color including theme color set to Pink. Same for other colored demos. You can change theme color from admin and even after importing a demo in a specific color, you can convert whole site to any color you want. There is a theme color picker option in admin and by choosing it, you can transform your site to any color you wish. Our provided icons also respond to theme color option which gives greater control to your design imagination.

Additional Theme Features

With an option of unlimited theme colors and advanced typography, Unbound theme ranks well above competitors. The core essence of Unbound Theme is cross-browser compatibility, clean comment based coding and SEO friendly design that provides a competitive edge to any business. Unbound Theme features the most versatile Revolution Slider and WPBakery Page Builder plugin that help in creating drag & drop sliders and mix & match elements respectively. The One Click Demo Import option in our WP theme, functions seamlessly. You’ll love the import process as it’s fast. You can import any demo within 1 minute! Go for restyling and modifying your existing menus with our easy-to-use RadiantThemes Mega Menu plugin, and with Radiant Themes advanced Theme option. Unbound WP Theme is fully responsive in nature, it is compatible on all mobile devices such as iPad, iPhone and all Android ready phones. Unbound is also Translation Ready.

Whether you are a creative agency, a photography studio, a startup company, a home-based freelancer or a mobile App development firm; you can make the most out of Unbound Business Corporate WordPress theme. Give it a go and see your visitor footfall to your site increasing, every passing day. Sounds interesting, isn’t it? Go for it and get the most out of it!

Salient Features – Unbound Agency Theme

Third-party plugin integration

  • WPBakery Page Builder
  • Slider Revolution
  • WooCommerce
  • Contact Form 7

The theme has been tested and works properly with the most popular WordPress plugins: SEO by Yoast, All in One SEO Pack, W3 Total Cache, WP Super Cache and many other popular WordPress Plugins.

Salient Features:

  • 100% Fully Responsive
  • WooCommerce compatibility
  • Built with HTML5 and CSS3
  • Smooth CSS3 animations
  • Well organized, clean and valid Code
  • Code built with SEO best practice in mind
  • Compatible with latest WordPress version
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • One click demo importer
  • 20 Unique homepage demos
  • Professional pre-built page layouts
  • 150+ pre-designed Template Blocks
  • WPBakery Page Builder
  • Slider Revolution Responsive WordPress Plugin
  • Compatible with Contact Form 7
  • Advanced Admin Panel based on Redux framework
  • 800+ Google Fonts
  • Google Maps support
  • Smooth scrolling
  • Full-Width and Boxed view
  • Sticky Header
  • Footer widget ready (4 customizable widgets)
  • Coming Soon mode
  • Dedicated post types for Portfolio
  • 10+ Portfolio element designs
  • Page builder active in Portfolio page
  • Fully Customizable
  • Fully Translatable
  • High Speed performance
  • Well Documented

We offer FREE support and services to our esteemed customers. Feel free to contact us, and if you face any problem with Unbound, just open a ticket and one of our support agents would be happy to answer your queries.

Requirement

To work with Unbound, please ensure that you are running WordPress 4.7 or higher, PHP 5.6 or higher, and MySQL 5.6 or higher. We have tested it with Mac, Windows and Linux. For better hosting experience, we recommend using https://wordpress.org/hosting/.

Recommended PHP Configuration Limits

Various issues that you may run into are: white screen, your demo import fails, empty page content and other similar issues which are all related to low PHP configuration limits. The best way is to increase the PHP limits of hosting account.

max_execution_time 300
memory_limit 128M
post_max_size 32M
upload_max_filesize 32M

items.name: iConsult – Business, Financial Consulting WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: WordPress Theme for.. Business, Finance, Insurance, Shop and more.

items.description:
Latest Version 2.7.5 – 17th/Nov/2021 View Changelog
WordPress 5.8.X Ready
WooCommerce 5.7.X Ready

iConsult – Business WordPress Theme:

iConsult is the perfect corporate, finance, consulting & business wordpress theme. With more than 200+ pre-designed template blocks, it becomes easy to customize look & feel of your/client’s site. Best part is, you don’t need to write any code to make these changes. Everything is drag & drop.

Fully Customizable

Choose from unlimited modern, clean and professional color skins, and unlimited header layouts, to perfectly frame your content and suit your brand style. The 100% customizable template blocks, can be customized even further and arranged in a multitude of ways. Or, style your own brand using 120+ visual composer short-codes and advance theme options.

Key Features:

  • 100% Fully Responsive
  • Well organized, clean and valid Code
  • Code built with SEO best practice in mind
  • Compatible with latest WordPress version
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • One click demo importer
  • Professional pre-built page layouts
  • Advanced Admin Panel based on Redux framework
  • 800+ Google Fonts
  • Google Maps support
  • Smooth scrolling
  • Knowledgebase
  • Fully Customizable
  • Fully Translatable
  • High Speed performance
  • FontAwesome icons
  • WPML localization support
  • One-click demo content import
  • Regular Updates
  • 24/7 Professional Support
  • Well Documented

Third Party Plug-in Integration

  • WPBakery Page Builder ($46)
  • Slider Revolution ($26)
  • Ultimate Addons for WPBakery Page Builder ($26)
  • WooCommerce
  • Contact Form 7

Plus, theme has been tested and works properly with the most popular WordPress plugins: SEO by Yoast, All in One SEO Pack, W3 Total Cache, WP Super Cache and many other popular WordPress Plugins.

Built with SEO in mind

iConsult is based on best SEO practices! Get your site rank high on search engines with our optimized WordPress theme!

Demo Content Included – One-click Demo Import

One click and you have a ready site just like the one you see in our demo

WPML & Translation Ready

Translate your website to any language with WPML easily! Use .pot files for a custom translations.

Google Fonts

Choose any of the Google web fonts library through powerful Real-time Customizer panel!

24-Hour Turnaround Support

We care about our customers and provide free support. Ask your questions using our forum support.

items.name: Calibra - Responsive Multi-Purpose WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Calibra - Powerful multipurpose theme

items.description:
Calibra is a business theme designed specifically for business, finance, consulting services. Can be also successfully used for corporate site, blog site, ecommerce site, portfolio and many more. It’s created by using the latest HTML5 and CSS3 techniques in accordance with the latest WordPress Coding Standards. Fits all popular mobile devices and tablets.

Calibra is the new ultimate multi-purpose WordPress theme designed to be customized. It is clean, super flexible, responsive, got the newest design, working with the awesome Visual Composer and created with a powerfull admin options panel !

This theme is what we call multi-purpose, was created with many different niches and professions in mind – bloggers, online stores, lawyers, agencies, wedding planners, hosting companies, nonprofits and more. Using the multiple style of Calibra you will be able to create any kind of website, the possibilities are endless !

We have our own support forum if you have any questions or problem. The theme also comes with lifetime updates and we are trying to keep adding new thing in every update. Calibra is super intuitive to use and really user friendly, include WPBakery Page Builder so you won’t need to code anything, we can asure you that even if you don’t know nothing about coding you will be able to create awesome website.

  • Clean, modern, multi-purpose design can be used for any type of website
  • WordPress 4.9.4 tested
  • Powerful Redux Options Framework powerd admin panal and metaboxes allow you set any aconfiguration and appearance aspect global and for individual page
  • Built with HTML5 and CSS3
  • SEO Optimized ( also compatible with SEO Plugins )
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE9 ~ IE11
  • Well organized, commented & clean code
  • 100% Responsive Theme
  • Retina Ready, Ultra-High Resoultion Graphics
  • Comes with the WPBakery Page Builder, most awesome visual page builder for WordPress
  • All Themes Icons are font icons ( more than 2000 icons included)
  • Built in Icon Fonts manager (you can add unlimited number of your own icon fonts)
  • Unlimited Number of Sidebar
  • Built in Megamenu features
  • Parallax and Video background for any VC row
  • Awesome CSS3 animations for every modules
  • Child Theme Compatible – includes basic child theme
  • Strong focus on design and typography, usability and overall user-experience.
  • Jquery Enhancements
One-click Demo Content Import With one click you can import
  • All content
  • Widgets
  • Revsliders
  • Template options
Advanced Customization / Themes Options
  • Powerful Redux Options Framework powerd admin panal and metaboxes allow you set any aconfiguration and appearance aspect global and for individual page
  • Customize Every part of the website using the Styling options.
  • Unlimited Colors options, you can customize your website to match your colors.
  • Built in Gradient picker, you can easy add gradient to any row, column and many VC elements.
  • Easily change Font and Font size.
  • Advanced options to enable/disable individual features
  • Change site layout in one click ( Wide or Boxed )
  • Choose between 7 menu types header style
Multiple Premium Slider Options
  • Include Amazing Revolution Slider Plugin – $25 Value
Calibra & WPBakery Page Builder
  • Calibra include the WPBakery Page Builder , Currently the most famous WordPress page builder – $34
  • We made 50+ custom elements for the Page Builder, you will be able to customize anything you want super easily, never code
  • Change style ( design ) and color of any modules super easily
  • Easily create stunning pages using our awesome modules.
  • WooCommerce Module compatible
Mega Menu Built In
  • Beautiful Mega Menu design for lage menus
  • Use from 1 to 6 columns
  • Fixed width and full width submenu
  • You can use icons and menu items badges easily for every menu items
  • Accepts widgets
WooCommerce compatible
  • Plugin ready with full design integration
  • Options for 1 to 4 Columns
  • Custom Visual Composer Modules to display your products
  • Custom layout for your shop pages
  • Custom design for single product pages
  • Display products based on category, SKU, sale, featured, newest etc
Popular Plugin Compatible
  • WooCommerce compatible with full design integration
  • WPML plugin ready
  • Contact Form 7 ready with full design intergration
  • Revolution Slider with full design integration
  • Events Calendar ready with full design integration
Advanced Page / Post Options
  • Show / hide subheader area.
  • Custom color and backgrounds for subheader area
  • Enable/disable menu overlay
  • Select overlay menu style (light/dark)
  • Choose left / right sidebar per page
  • Built in Widget Rules (enable or disable widget visibilty for certain pages or posts)
Unlimited Color Options
  • Extremely detailed styling tab in theme options
  • Unlimited Color Options / Skins with backend and front end Color Picker and Gradient Picker
  • Full Color Customizations – change every element with ease including all Visual Composer Modules.
Advanced Blog Options
  • 3 Layouts to choose from : Large feartured images, Medium featured images, Grid
  • All layouts can have left or right sidebar or be full width
  • 6 post types ( video, audio, gallery, image, quote, standard )
  • Auto generated thumbnails
  • Easily specify the number of items per page
  • Threaded Comments
  • Tons of options to customize meta data display, excerpt lenght etc
Advanced Portfolio Options
  • 1-4 Column layout options
  • Portfolio Grid layout
  • Set up multiple portfolio pages and set custom categories per page
  • Select specific categories for each portfolio, fully customized
  • Set custom skills and tags for each portfolio posts
  • Full width of Half width single portfolio layout
  • 6 portfolio item type (single image, multiple image, flex gallery, video, audio, custom content)
  • Easily specify the number of items per page
  • Post sharing with social icons
  • Threaded Comments
Advanced Typography Options
  • Use Google Fonts or Standard fonts
  • All font options are controlled in the theme options panel
  • Set different font sizes for all fonts, H1-H6 headings, body, footer, header, dropdown etc
  • Set different colors for all fonts
  • Set font-size, line-height, font-weight for each font type as well
Advanced Background Options
  • Unlimited Backgrounds for boxed and wide mode
  • Choose Color of upload custom background image
  • Full width sections also allow background images with parallax or video

Theme Requirements

  • PHP version 5.6 and higher
  • max_execution_time – 3600
  • max_input_time – 3600
  • memory_limit – 256M
  • post_max_size – 64M
  • upload_max_filesize – 64M
  • max_input_vars – 3000

Note! Make sure your server is set up properly before theme installation. Especially check max_input_vars settings value (by default on most server is set to 1000 and it is to low for properly saving theme options). Enough server configuration will also ensure fast speed and increase performance.

Credits

  • jQuery
  • Revoution Slider WP plugin
  • Nice Scroll jQuery plugin
  • mb.YTPlayer
  • Isotope jQuery plugin
  • Font Awesome icon font
  • Meteocon icon font
  • Social icon font
  • Linecons icon font

Images used in the Demo

Most of images used in demo are stock photos bought on Photodune , Shutterstock or Dreamstime. Rest demo photos is licenced Creative Common Licence. Please note that demo images are used only for demonstration purposes and are not included in theme package.
